{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=AR7522 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197D |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812AR |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|2T2R 802.11a/b/g/n/ac Giga Router}} :[http://www.abocom.com.tw/product.aspx?id=179 Product page]{{â€¢}} [http://www.abocom.com.tw/uploadfile/The%20brochure%20of%20AR7522_0731.pdf Datasheet]
Full P/Ns specified in the datasheet are... *RTL8197D-CG *RTL8812AR-CG *RTL8192CE-VA4-GR *RTL8367RB-CG
Additional specifications, per '''AboCom''''s datasheet, follow...<small> *Transmit Power (all +- 1.5 dBm) **802.11a/g: 14 dBm @ 54Mbps **802.11b: 17 dBm @ 11Mbps **802.11gn HT20: 13 dBm @ MCS7 **802.11gn HT40: 13 dBm @ MCS7 **802.11an HT20: 13 dBm @ MCS7 **802.11an HT40: 13 dBm @ MCS7 **802.11ac HT20: 12 dBm @ MCS8 **802.11ac HT40: 11 dBm @ MCS9 **802.11ac HT80: 11 dBm @ MCS9 *Receiver Sensitivity (all +- 2 dBm) **802.11b: -72 dBm @ 11Mbps **802.11a/g: -65 dBm @ 54Mbps **802.11n HT20: -64 dBm @ MCS7 **802.11n HT40: -61 dBm @ MCS7 **802.11ac HT20: -57 dBm @ MCS8 **802.11ac HT40: -54 dBm @ MCS9 **802.11ac HT80: -51 dBm @ MCS9</small> *Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::110 mm x 165 mm x 27 mm]]
